languages.text: "Эти дары сквозят фальшью — они мне ни к чему. Если они помогут тебе наставить новые заблудшие души на путь истинный или же уничтожить тех, кто будет мешать тебе это сделать — забирай их, {mf|сыне|дщерь}. Тем, кто искренне верует в ложного бога я бы их не продал".

"These gifts are tainted with falsity — I do not need them. Take them, if they help you guide new lost souls toward the right path or destroy those who would prevent you from doing so. I would not sell them to a true believer in a false god."
languages.original_text: "Эти дары сквозят фальшью — они мне ни к чему. Если они помогут тебе наставить новые заблудшие души на путь истинный или же уничтожить тех, кто будет мешать тебе это сделать — забирай их, {mf|сыне|дщерь}. Тем, кто искренне верует в ложного бога я бы их не продал".

traits.locale_text: "These gifts are so fake, I have no need of them. Take them away if they help you guide new lost souls toward the right path, or destroy those who would prevent you from doing so, {mf|son|daiughter}. I would not sell them to a true believer in a false god."

"These gifts are so fake, I have no need of them. Take them away if they help you guide new lost souls toward the right path, or destroy those who would prevent you from doing so, {mf|son|daiughter}. I would not sell them to a true believer in a false god."

"These gifts are so fake, I do not need them. Take them away if they help you guide new lost souls toward the right path, or destroy those who would prevent you from doing so, {mf|son|daiughter}. I would not sell them to a true believer in a false god."

"These gifts are tainted with falsity — I do not need them. Take them, if they help you guide new lost souls toward the right path or destroy those who would prevent you from doing so, {mf|son|daughter}. I would not sell them to a true believer in a false god."

"These gifts are tainted with falsity — I do not need them. Take them, if they help you guide new lost souls toward the right path or destroy those who would prevent you from doing so. I would not sell them to a true believer in a false god."

"These gifts are tainted with falsity — I do not need them. Take them, if they help you guide new lost souls toward the right path or destroy those who would prevent you from doing so. I would not sell them to a true believer in a false god."

languages.text: 「この贈り物は偽りに染まっています。私には必要ありません。新たな迷える魂を導き、それを阻む者たちを撃ち滅ぼす助けになるのであれば、持って行くといい。私なら偽の神の真の信奉者にそれを売ったりはしませんが」
languages.original_text: "These gifts are tainted with falsity — I do not need them. Take them, if they help you guide new lost souls toward the right path or destroy those who would prevent you from doing so. I would not sell them to a true believer in a false god."

traits.locale_text: 「この贈り物は偽りに染まっています。私には必要ありません。新たな迷える魂を導き、それを阻む者たちを撃ち滅ぼす助けになるのであれば、持って行くといい。私なら偽の神の真の信奉者にそれを売ったりはしませんが」

languages.text: « Ces cadeaux sont teintés de perfidie, je n'en ai pas besoin. Prenez-les s'ils peuvent vous aider à guider de nouvelles âmes perdues sur le droit chemin, ou anéantir ceux qui risqueraient de vous en empêcher. Jamais je ne les vendrais à un adorateur d'un dieu imposteur. »
languages.original_text: "These gifts are tainted with falsity — I do not need them. Take them, if they help you guide new lost souls toward the right path or destroy those who would prevent you from doing so. I would not sell them to a true believer in a false god."

traits.locale_text: « Ces cadeaux sont des faux, je n'en ai pas besoin. Prenez-les s'ils peuvent vous aider à guider de nouvelles âmes perdues sur le droit chemin, ou anéantir ceux qui risqueraient de vous en empêcher, {mf|mon fils|ma fille}. Jamais je ne les vendrais à un adorateur d'un dieu imposteur. »

languages.text: “那些礼物充满了虚假的祝福，我不再需要它们了。如果这些东西可以帮助你，让其他迷失的灵魂走向正途，或是摧毁那些阻止你传播真理的人，你就把它们都带走吧。我绝不会把它们卖给那些信奉伪神的信徒。”
languages.original_text: "These gifts are tainted with falsity — I do not need them. Take them, if they help you guide new lost souls toward the right path or destroy those who would prevent you from doing so. I would not sell them to a true believer in a false god."

traits.locale_text: “那些礼物都是虚假的，我不再需要它们了。如果这些东西可以帮助你，让其他迷失的灵魂走向正途，或是摧毁那些阻止你传播真理的人，你就把它们都带走吧，{mf|孩子|女儿}。我绝不会把它们卖给那些信奉伪神的信徒。”

languages.text: "Diese Geschenke sind von Falschheit befleckt, ich brauche sie nicht. Nehmt sie, wenn Ihr damit neue verlorene Seelen auf den rechten Weg führen könnt, oder vernichtet jene, die Euch daran hindern wollen. Ich würde sie keinem wahren Anhänger eines falschen Gottes verkaufen."
languages.original_text: "These gifts are tainted with falsity — I do not need them. Take them, if they help you guide new lost souls toward the right path or destroy those who would prevent you from doing so. I would not sell them to a true believer in a false god."

traits.locale_text: "Diese Geschenke sind falsch, ich brauche sie nicht. Nehmt sie, wenn Ihr damit neue verlorene Seelen auf den rechten Weg führen könnt, oder vernichtet jene, die Euch daran hindern wollen, {mf|mein Sohn|meine Tochter}. Ich würde sie keinem wahren Gläubigen an einen falschen Gott verkaufen.

languages.text: «Estos regalos están manchados por la falacia, no los necesito. Lléveselos si los puede usar para enseñar a almas nuevas qué camino tomar, o destruya aquellos que se lo impidan. Jamás se los vendería a un creyente de un falso dios».
languages.original_text: "These gifts are tainted with falsity — I do not need them. Take them, if they help you guide new lost souls toward the right path or destroy those who would prevent you from doing so. I would not sell them to a true believer in a false god."

traits.locale_text: «Estos regalos son demasiado falsos, no los necesito. Lléveselos si los puede usar para enseñar a almas nuevas qué camino tomar, o destruya aquellos que se lo impidan hacer, hij{mf|o|a} mí{mf|o|a}. Jamás se los vendería a un creyente de un falso dios».

languages.text: "Bu armağanlar düzmecelikle kirlenmiş, onlara ihtiyacım yok. Başka kayıp ruhları doğru yola doğru yönlendirmene veya sana engel olmaya çalışanları yok etmene yardımcı olacaksa onları alabilirsin. Neticede sahte bir tanrıya iman edenlere satacak hâlim yok."
languages.original_text: "These gifts are tainted with falsity — I do not need them. Take them, if they help you guide new lost souls toward the right path or destroy those who would prevent you from doing so. I would not sell them to a true believer in a false god."

traits.locale_text: "Bu armağanlar düzmecelikle kirlenmiş, onlara ihtiyacım yok. Eğer başka kayıp ruhları doğru yola doğru yönlendirmene veya sana engel olmaya çalışanları yok etmene yardımcı olacaksa alabilirsin onları. Onları sahte bir tanrının gerçek bir inananına satacak hâlim yok."
